name: Romanian Vibes: The Dress-Up Game
description:
A teeny, tiny dress-up game about Romanian fashion. Game concept and Character art inspired by Fallout Shelter.

"I created this tiny dress-up game thinking that: in my whole gaming experience, the Witcher 3 was the first time in my life I saw any semblance of East-European culture in mainstream gaming media.  My country's traditional costume, the "IE" is a worldwide fashion symbol, so I think a lot of people will enjoy this experience, even if for a brief while."

The game features:

  • 5 possible outfits
  • 4 (to ten) minutes of playtime
  • 3 backgrounds
  • 2 characters
  • 1 big Romanian experience

Design and art assets by Elena. Programming by Zack.

INSTRUCTIONS: Download "Romanian Dress Up.rar", then extract it to your choice of folder. Click "Romanian Dress Up.exe", which will launch the game. To exit game press Alt + Tab. Right click the .exe icon then press "Close window."

Consider supporting my work on Ko-fi.
